QuestData.Title: Powering the Waygate - The Makers' Overlook
QuestData.Description: We cannot stop now, $r. You've triggered the first switch, but one remains.$B$BThe titans constructed a second vantage point where they oversaw their creations. You'll find it to the east, high in the mountains.$B$BPull the activation switch theta inside the overlook and the waygate will open.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Avatar of Freya wants you to head to the Makers' Overlook in eastern Sholazar Basin and use the Activation Switch Theta.
QuestData.RewardText: The waygate is active, $n. It is time!
